---
title: Course Domain
description: Course Domain Documentation
---

import Badge from '@site/src/components/badges/badges';

The LEAs are required to submit the following templates in the Course Domain:

- **[Course Template](docs/templates/course/course.mdx)**
- **[Course Instructor Template](docs/templates/course/course-instructor.mdx)**
- **[Student Course Enrollment Template](docs/templates/course/student-course-enrollment.mdx)**

These templates apply to the following organizational types:

- School Districts
- Intermediate Units
- Career and Technical Centers
- Charter Schools
- State Juvenile Correctional Institutions

:::warning[Important Note]
All entities are permitted to submit data (for the Staff Student Subtest Template), and are encouraged to, if they wish to utilize PVAAS teacher-specific measures in their local evaluation processes.
:::

:::note
All fields may not be mandatory; however, all fields within each template **MUST BE** accounted for in order to transmit data.
:::
